text: Thank you! Is this possible to do in a module itself, It's very important for my client
hello can someone please help me, regarding opting out an email from all?
I need to do it via php cURL HubSpot API
This may help <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/marketing-api/subscriptions-preferences>
Hey Bradley thank you. Is this to unsubscribe completely?
i need to completely unsubscribe a contact from HubSpot
i found this: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/email/update_status>
but not sure how to do it via php and curl
im using this but dont get a response
I don't know anything about curl, but you can look at the endpoints and they give you some samples.
You may have to run that for every subscription type, I have no idea
If you're using the legacy one there is a curl example

Hi <@U01RU55DN1H> what do you mean by a module?  In HubSpot, modules are building blocks for content like pages and emails, in that case it wouldn’t be possible but you might be referring to something else so I’d like to learn more if you don’t mind
Hi All i want know is there any where i can  update alt text using API's

Was the payload for HubSpot Owner ID "email" changed to userId?

`{ Name: userId:XXXX, Role: end-user, Email: userId:XXXX }`  where Email used to be the owner's email address not some HubSpot ID
Yup! Here’s some background: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/crm-property-change-source-will-show-owner-id-instead-of-owner-email>
Let me know if this is something else though
anyway to reference email through that field?
it broke an integration i had
Yeah, you can look that up in the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/owners|owners API>
Sorry to hear that, we try and give notice as widely as possible but clearly we miss some cases. Where would you have preferred to see us announce this?
its fine, just gotta tweak some things.
Thank you for responding
<@U2H3TT8F2> is there something going on with webhooks? There's no error codes or messages:
